fest-swing-junit v. 0.6

This document is the API specification for the JUnit-specific extensions for the FEST Swing module 0.6.

Packages
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit Contains some workarounds to some limitations of the JUnit Ant Task.
